Summary: The UAV loads an up-to-date terrain map for its planned flight route prior to deployment.

Summary: The UAV shall adjust its altitude to compensate for changes in terrain based.

Summary: The system cedes control to the RPIC upon request

Summary: Time to impact is computed based on velocity and direction of flight
